column4: can someone help me with my sound in fujitsu siemens amilo m1451g please ? it used to work with the last version of ubuntu ??
did you start the alsa-utils service?
no, just checked alsamixer.. [i'm trying now]
ok, started alsa-utils, any need to do some extra thing to test?  i went to system > preferences > sound .. and clicked test, but still got no sound.
type id, do you see audio there?
i see all the menu, with dropdown menus to choose from different outputs [pcm, master] and also in some of them my sound card.. i choose it click test,  but still no sound
alsamixer tells that all the outputs are unmuted.
did you apt-get install alsa-utils and start it?
yes.. it was already installed, plus i went to /e
/etc/init.d and sudo alsa-utils start IT!! that's it right ?
